Description: Navigate to Administration > Users tab and verify all users are displayed with correct information
Test Data: Valid user data with various roles and statuses

Description: Click Add New User button > Enter StaffID 93313 > Verify auto-filled name and email > Select role > Click Create
Click Edit button on user row > Modify role field > Click Save > Verify changes are applied
Test Data: User: John Smith; Change role from User to Account Manager

Description: Click toggle switch to disable active user > Verify user status changes to Inactive
Click Delete button > Confirm deletion > Verify user is removed from list
Use role filter dropdown > Select System Admin > Verify only System Admin users are displayed
Use status filter > Select Active > Verify only active users are displayed
Enter user name in search box > Verify filtered results match search criteria
Click Add New User by Bulk Upload > Download sample CSV > Upload valid CSV file > Verify successful import
Test Data: CSV file with 5 valid user records

Description: Navigate to Roles tab > Verify all roles are displayed with permissions and active user count
Test Data: Default roles: System Admin CIC Team Account Manager etc.

Description: Click Create New Role > Enter role name Custom Role > Select permissions > Save > Verify role appears in list
Test Data: Role name: Custom Test Role; Permissions: Dashboard Access Send Notifications

Description: Click Edit button on role card > Modify permissions > Save > Verify permission changes are applied
Test Data: Role: Account Manager; Add Template Management permission

Description: Click Delete button on role card > Confirm deletion > Verify role is removed
Test Data: Role: Custom Test Role (with no assigned users)

Description: Navigate to Settings > Open Auto-Update section > Change interval to 30 minutes > Save > Verify setting persists
Open Delay Control section > Set delay to 10 minutes > Save > Verify confirmation message appears
Toggle External Communication switch > Save > Verify warning message about active processes
Toggle Internal Communication switch > Save > Verify confirmation and active processes termination
Configure Auto Trigger and Manual Trigger toggles > Save > Verify settings are applied
Test Data: Auto Trigger: ON Manual Trigger: OFF

Description: Set Customer data retention to 365 days and Outage data retention to 180 days > Save > Verify confirmation
Test Data: Customer data: 365 days; Outage data: 180 days

Description: Enter Customer Account B1012345 > Select opt-out > Save > Verify customer preference updated
Download sample CSV > Upload file with customer opt-out preferences > Verify bulk update summary report
Set extreme weather delay to 15 minutes > Save > Verify setting is saved correctly
Toggle Extreme Weather Mode > Confirm warning about ongoing messages > Verify mode is activated
Navigate to Alert Group section > Configure alert time between notifications > Save settings
Set maximum number of updates to 5 > Save > Verify limit is applied
Navigate to Opt-out Exception Report > Apply date filter Today > Search by customer account > View results
Test Data: Date filter: Today; Customer account: B1012345

Action: Enable daily opt-out exception report email
Description: Configure role permissions for Receive opt-out exception report > Enable email delivery
Enter invalid StaffID 99999 > Verify error message for user not found
Try to add user with existing StaffID > Verify system prevents duplicate creation

Action: Delete user assigned to role in use
Description: Try to delete user currently assigned to active role > Verify system prevents deletion
Upload CSV with missing required columns > Verify detailed error messages
Upload CSV file larger than 10MB > Verify file size error message
Search for non-existent user name > Verify No users found message
Enter existing role name > Verify system prevents duplicate role creation
Leave role name field blank > Verify validation error message
Try to delete role with active users > Verify system prevents deletion and shows warning
Try to edit default system role > Verify system prevents modification of critical roles
Enter negative number or non-integer value > Verify validation error message
Enter negative delay time > Verify validation prevents saving invalid values
Enter value exceeding maximum limit > Verify system shows error and prevents saving
Enter invalid customer account > Verify customer not found error
Upload CSV with wrong format or invalid customer accounts > Verify detailed error report
Disable external communication while notifications are being sent > Verify warning about active process termination
Add user when system is at maximum user capacity > Verify appropriate handling
Perform multiple user edit/delete actions rapidly > Verify system handles concurrent operations
Apply role AND status filters simultaneously > Verify combined filtering works correctly
Click different column headers to sort > Verify sorting works for all sortable columns
Test Data: Sort by: Name Email Role Status Last Login

Description: Navigate through multiple pages with 100+ users > Verify pagination functionality
Try to assign duplicate permissions to role > Verify system handles gracefully
Create role with maximum permissions selected > Verify all permissions are saved

Action: Edit role while users are active
Description: Edit role permissions while users with that role are actively using system
Test Data: Active users with role being modified

Description: Modify settings during scheduled maintenance window > Verify appropriate handling
Multiple admins changing different settings simultaneously > Verify no conflicts occur

Action: Extreme weather mode during normal weather
Description: Enable extreme weather mode during normal weather conditions > Verify mode functions correctly
Upload CSV with 10000+ customer opt-out requests > Verify system handles large batch processing
Rapidly enable/disable communication switches > Verify system state consistency
Set alert time to minimum (1 minute) and maximum allowed values > Verify acceptance

Action: Database connection failure during user add
Description: Simulate database failure while adding user > Verify appropriate error handling and rollback
User session expires while editing user information > Verify session handling
Two admins try to delete same user simultaneously > Verify conflict resolution
System error occurs during CSV processing > Verify error logging and user notification
System failure while updating role permissions > Verify rollback and error handling
Role is deleted while being assigned to user > Verify transaction integrity
Network interruption during settings save > Verify data integrity and error recovery
System enters invalid state due to conflicting settings > Verify error detection and correction
Failure in integration with external systems (ADMS SharePoint) > Verify error handling
Weather service API failure during extreme weather mode > Verify fallback procedures
Alert notification system failure during triggered events > Verify alternative alert mechanisms
Customer opt-out service unavailable during bulk operation > Verify error handling and retry logic
System runs out of memory/CPU during peak operations > Verify graceful degradation
Attempt to access admin functions without proper permissions > Verify security controls
System fails to write to audit logs > Verify alternative logging and error notification
